BRK25 &#160; New York Stock Exchange Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;8.01 Other Events. On October&#160;15, 2020, Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation (&#8220;BHFC&#8221;) issued $750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 1.450% Senior Notes due 2030 (the &#8220;2030 Notes&#8221;) and $1,750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.850% Senior Notes due 2050 (the &#8220;2050 Notes&#8221; and together with the 2030 Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) under the Registration Statement. The Notes, which are fully and unconditionally guaranteed by Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (&#8220;Berkshire&#8221;), were sold pursuant to an underwriting agreement entered into on October&#160;5, 2020, by and between (a)&#160;BHFC and Berkshire and (b)&#160;BofA Securities, Inc. and J.P. Morgan Securities LLC. The Notes were issued under an Indenture, dated as of January&#160;26, 2016, by and among Berkshire, BHFC and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. (the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;) and (i)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of October&#160;15, 2020 by Berkshire with respect to the 2030 Notes (the &#8220;2030 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221;) and (ii)&#160;an officers&#8217; certificate dated as of October&#160;15, 2020 by BHFC with respect to the 2050 Notes (the &#8220;2050 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate&#8221; and, together with the 2030 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate, the &#8220;Officers&#8217; Certificates&#8221;). The relevant terms of the Notes and the Indenture are further described under the caption &#8220;Description of the Notes and Guarantees&#8221; in the prospectus supplement relating to the Notes, dated October&#160;5, 2020, filed with the Commission by Berkshire and BHFC on October&#160;7, 2020, pursuant to Rule&#160;424(b)(5) under the Securities Act and in the section entitled &#8220;Description of the Debt Securities&#8221; in the base prospectus relating to debt securities of BHFC, dated January&#160;28, 2019, included in the Registration Statement, which descriptions are incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the Indenture is set forth in Exhibit 4.1 of the Registration Statement and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2030 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.2 and is incorporated herein by reference. A copy of the 2050 Notes Officers&#8217; Certificate is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.3 and is incorporated herein by reference. The descriptions of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes in this report are summaries and are qualified in their entirety by the terms of the Indenture, the Officers&#8217; Certificates and the Notes, respectively. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; &#160;&#160;1.1 &#160;&#160; Underwriting Agreement, dated October&#160;5, 2020, by and between (a)&#160;Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation and Berkshire Hathaway Inc. and (b)&#160;BofA Securities, Inc. and J.P. Morgan Securities LLC. &#160;&#160;4.1 &#160;&#160; Indenture, dated as of January&#160;26, 2016, by and among Berkshire Hathaway Inc., Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., (incorporated by reference to Exhibit 4.1 of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. and Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation&#8217;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (Registration Nos.&#160;333-229396 and 333-229396-01) filed with the Commission on January&#160;28, 2019). &#160;&#160;4.2 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation, dated as of October&#160;15, 2020, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Finance Corporation&#8217;s 1.450% Senior Notes due 2030. &#160;&#160;4.3 &#160;&#160; Officers&#8217; Certificate of Berkshire Hathaway Finance Corporation, dated as of October&#160;15, 2020, including the form of Berkshire Hathaway&#160;Finance Corporation&#8217;s 2.850% Senior Notes due 2050. &#160;&#160;5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP, dated October&#160;15, 2020, with respect to the Notes. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Munger, Tolles&#160;&amp; Olson LLP with respect to the Notes (included in Exhibit 5.1). &#160;104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document).
